  name={<><a href="#ae81805394c188339347a77ae1725c4f4">rewrite</a> (const SCEV &#42;S, const Loop &#42;L, ScalarEvolution &amp;SE, bool IgnoreOtherLoops=true)</>}>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

Takes <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> S and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> L.

For each AddRec sub-expression, use its start expression in case its <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> is L. If it is not L then if IgnoreOtherLoops is true then use AddRec itself otherwise rewrite cannot be done. If <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> contains non-invariant unknown <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> rewrite cannot be done.

Definition at line 4865 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/scalarevolution-cpp">ScalarEvolution.cpp</a>.
